title: Cloud example with all defaults generates Error message "Exception in Overseer main queue loop"
description:
Fresh Solr 6.0 instance. Run bin/solr create -e cloud, accept all defaults.

The Admin UI's Logging screen shows the very first message as an Overseer NPE on ERROR level (as per the screenshot).

comments.author: Shalin Shekhar Mangar
comments.content: I think this is a duplicate of SOLR-8875

comments.author: Alexandre Rafalovitch
comments.content: The issue is gone in the latest branch_6x, so I am happy to assume it is the duplicate as suggested.
